comment_text: The engineer here seems to see this competition as a bit of fun, but a product minded person would be in horror of how much time was wasted on a goal that added little or no value to the messenger product. competitors like Skype were building out new features like video conferencing or audio calling while these two were goofing off fighting over a relative small part of the communications pie. This rat holing left msn irrelevant by the time gtalk and Skype arrived on the scene.
author: tsunamifury
